body.para: To access the Fixture Maintenance screen, press the [MAINT MENU] soft key on the main Navigation Menu screen. The Maintenance Menu is displayed, press the [FIXTURE MAINTENANCE] button.

para.text: Fixture Maintenance Button on Navigation Menu Screen

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:4px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:0px; border-style:none; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The following items can be operated in the Fixture Maintenance screen:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-10px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:10px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:11px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-10px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:10px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:11px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-37px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:11px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:11px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:11px left ;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: For safety, only one item can be operated at one time.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Basic maintenance advice is displayed to assist in fixture operation.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The current step in the Work Load/Unload sequence and the Fixture Clamp/Unclamp sequence are displayed here. Seat Check Enabled/Disabled status as well as Seat Check Pass/Fail status is also displayed.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: It is necessary to unlock the screen by pressing the
button. When pressed, the button will light up and display
, allowing the operator to use the buttons on the screen.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The screen shown above is for reference only (Refer to
). In the actual machine, options not installed will not appear. Example; Auto Door, Fixture Coolant, Air Seat, etc.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
